text: Dilson Neves Quaresma, simply known as Dilson, is a São Toméan footballer who plays as a left back for UDRA and the São Tomé and Príncipe national team. ==Club career== On 13 January 2019, Dilson joined Equatorial Guinean Liga Nacional de Fútbol club Cano Sport Academy. ==International career== Dilson made his international debut for São Tomé and Príncipe in 2017. ==References== Category:Date of birth uncertain Category:1990s births Category:Living people Category:Association football fullbacks Category:São Tomé and Príncipe footballers Category:São Tomé and Príncipe international footballers Category:Cano Sport Academy players Category:São Tomé and Príncipe expatriate footballers Category:São Tomé and Príncipe expatriate sportspeople in Equatorial Guinea Category:Expatriate footballers in Equatorial Guinea Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Dilson (footballer)
